NVIDIA Mid-Range Ada Lovelace Released 2023-05-24

NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti

A solid 1080p card that handles 1440p with DLSS 3. The 8GB VRAM is its main limitation in 2026, but at current prices below MSRP, it offers decent value for budget-conscious gamers.

Who Is the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Best For?

Frequently Asked Questions

Is the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti good for gaming?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti scores 65/100 at 1080p, 58/100 at 1440p, and 38/100 at 4K in our gaming benchmarks. It is best suited for 1080p gaming on a budget and small form factor pcs.

What is the price of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti has an MSRP of $399 and is currently available for approximately $369.

How much VRAM does the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti have?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti has 8GB of GDDR6 memory on a 128-bit memory bus, providing adequate memory for 1080p gaming and everyday use.

What power supply do I need for the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti?

The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti has a TDP of 160W. We recommend a minimum 550W power supply. It uses a 1x 8-pin power connector.
